channel.description: Recent content in personal on Pierre Zemb

item.title: 10 years of programming and counting 🚀
item.description: I’ve just realized that I’ve spent the last decade programming 🤯 While 2020 feels like a strange year, I thought it would be nice to write down a retrospective of the last 10 years 🗓 Learning to program 👨🏻‍💻 I wrote my first Hello, world program somewhere around September 2010, when I started my engineering school to do some electronics, but that C language got me. I spent 6 months struggling to understand pointers and memory.
